Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Reviewer, Neural Computing and Applications Journal
Reviewer, European Journal of Operational Research
Reviewer, Computational Statistics and Data Analysis Journal
Reviewer, Expert System and Applications Journal

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Invited Talk - An evolutionary approach for the design of experiments, 2nd Workshop of the ERCIM Working group on Computing and Statistics, Limassol, Cyprus
Local Organiser of the International Conference on Model-Oriented Data Analysis, Bertinoro, Italy

Poster Presentation - Application of combinatorial optimization methods to copula models involving large numbers of parameters, 19th International conference on Computational Statistics, Paris, France

Invited Talk - An evolutionary approach for the design of experiments: an application of the ant colony algorithm, 8th International conference of numerical analysis and applied mathematics, Rodhes, Greece
Invited Talk - Comparison of different algorithms for optimizing the pseudo-likelihood surface in copula models, 3rd Workshop of the ERCIM Working group on Computing and Statistics, London, UK
Invited Talk - An evolutionary approach to experimental design for combinatorial optimization, Designed Experiments: recent advances in methods and applications, DEMA, Cambridge, UK
Invited talk - Improving complex experiments by co-information composite likelihood optimization, 4th Workshop of the ERCIM Working group on Computing and Statistics, London, UK
Organizer of the 1st COBRA Summer School, BioChemITSchool2012, San Candido, Italy
Contributed talk - Naive Bayes ant colony optimization for experimental design, 6th International conference on soft methods in probability and statistics, Konstanz, Germany
Poster Presentation - Maximum entropy design in high dimensions by composite likelihood modeling, 10th Workshop on model-oriented data analysis and optimum design, Lagow Lubuski, Poland
Steering Commitee and Chair of the First Workshop on Computational-aided and Bio-chemical Strategies for the Design of Stochastic Experiments, CNR - IMATI, Milan
Invited Talk - Intelligent control system model-based optimisation for energy saving, 7th Workshop of the ERCIM Working group on Computing and Statistics, Pisa, Italy
Invited talk - Bayesian sequential design for multi-objective process optimisation, 48èmes Journées de Statistique de la SFdS, Montpellier, France
Contributed Talk - A multi-objective Bayesian sequential design based on Pareto optimality - 11th Workshop on model oriented data analysis and optimum design, Hamminkeln-Dindden, Germany

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Junior Research at Greta Associati, Venice, Italy. Research Topics: Methodological aspects of back-calculation for time series PEEIs.
Visiting Researcher at GlaxoSmithKline, Harlow, UK. Research topics: development of statistical models for biological systems.
Visiting Researcher at IRIDIA - CoDE Department, Université Libre de Bruxelles, Bruxelles, Belgium. Research topics: ant colony optimization and stochastic local search optimization.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: PACE - Programmable Artificial Cell Evolution. Collaboration for the European research project, EU integrated project in FP6-IST-FET, Complex System Initiative.
DICE - Design of Informative Combinatorial Experiments. Collaboration for the research project funded by Fondazione di Venezia with ECLT group, Venice, Italy

iNSPiRE - Development of Systematic Packages for Deep Energy Renovation of Residential and Tertiary Buildings including Envelope and Systems. Collaboration for the research project funded by EU commission, EeB.NMP.2012-2, with ECLT group, Venice, Italy.

Str.A.T.E.G.A. - Strategie e automazioni tecnologiche per l'efficienza e la gestione ambientale. Collaboration for the national project funded by Agenzia Provinciale per l'Incentivazione delle Attività Economiche di Trento with ECLT group, Venice, Italy.
FIDEAS - Fabbrica Intelligente. Collaboration for the national project funded by Regione Lombardia with CNR-IMATI group, Milan, Italy

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Ph.D. Fellowship, Department of Statistics, University of Bologna, Bologna, Italy.
Postdoctoral Fellowship, Statistical models for high dimensional data, Ca' Foscari University of Venice, Venice, Italy.
Professore a contratto per l'attivazione del Corso Estivo integrativo all'insegnamento di STATISTICA (20h), Università Ca' Foscari di Venezia, Venezia, Italia
Postdoctoral Fellowship, Combinatorial sampling of data in high dimensional settings, Ca' Foscari University of Venice, Venice, Italy.
Professore a contratto per l'attivazione del corso ESERCITAZIONI 2a PARTE integrativo all'insegnamento STATISTICA (10h), Università Ca' Foscari di Venezia, Venezia, Italia
Professore a contratto per l'attivazione dell'insegnamento STATISTICA I (30h), Università Ca' Foscari di Venezia, Venezia, Italia
Professore a contratto per l'attività dei corsi integrativi dell'insegnamento STATISTICA II (10h), Università Ca' Foscari di Venezia, Venezia, Italia
Professore a contratto per l'attività dei corsi integrativi dell'insegnamento STATISTICA I (10h), Università Ca' Foscari di Venezia, Venezia, Italia
Postdoctoral Fellowship, Combinatorial sampling of data in high dimensional settings, Ca' Foscari University of Venice, Venice, Italy.
Incarico di Docenza al Master I Livello in "Management della Sostenibilità e del Carbon Footprint" (10h), Ca' Foscari University of Venice, Venice, Italy
Postdoctoral fellowship, Informative design for high dimensional data, Ca' Foscari University of Venice, Venice, Italy.

Risultati ottenuti nel trasferimento tec.content: Chief Executive Officer of EvoSoutions S.r.l. . EvoSolutions is a small enterprise focused on design and optimization of industrial process. EvoSolutions is not a university spin off but it is devoted to transfer cutting edge technologies to small medium enterprises.
